The Fellowship of the Ring Software Adventure

{{video game infobox | image = Trilogy-1-.jpg | name=The Tolkien Trilogy (Europe)
The Tolkien Software Adventure (North-America and Australia) | developer=Beam Software ([[Melbourne House]]) | publisher=[[Beau-Jolly]] (Europe)
[[Addison-Wesley]] (North-America and Australia) | platform=[[Wikipedia:Amstrad CPC|Amstrad CPC]], [[Wikipedia:Commodore 64|Commodore 64]], [[Wikipedia:ZX Spectrum|ZX Spectrum]] | releasedate=[[1989]] | genre=[[Wikipedia:Text-Adventure|Text-Adventure]] with illustrations |}} == The Tolkien Trilogy == The Tolkien Trilogy is a series of games which cover ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' which also included paperback editions of ''The Hobbit'', ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and ''[[The Two Towers]]''. It was only published in Europe.[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=6 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo], p. 6 (Retrieved 4 August 2011) The following games are part of the series: # [[The Hobbit (1982 video game)|The Hobbit]] # [[Lord of the Rings: Game One]] # [[Shadows of Mordor]] == The Tolkien Software Adventure Trilogy == The Tolkien Software Adventure Series is a couple of Software Adventure games that cover ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and included the European paperback editions, ''[[The Hobbit]]'', ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', ''[[The Two Towers]]'' and ''[[The Return of the King]]''. It was only published in North-America and Australia.The Tolkien Software Adventure Trilogy at [http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/software.html Tolkien Games] (Retrieved 4 August 2011) The following games are part of the series: # [[The Hobbit Software Adventure]] # [[The Fellowship of the Ring Software Adventure]] # [[Shadows of Mordor Software Adventure]] # [[Crack of Doom Software Adventure]] {{references}} {{title|italics}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Tolkien Trilogy}} [[Category:Amstrad CPC games]] [[Category:Commodore 64 games]] [[Category:Melbourne House games]] [[Category:Text-Adventure video games]] [[Category:ZX Spectrum games]]
